Translations.Text: Mi Neiief si lambiyya lmitaq nnsen, u si kecc, si Nue, Iboahim, Musa, u si Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, Neiief segsen lmitaq lfayeq
iwakken ad Ietec imawlan n tidep, af tidep nnsen. Ihegga d, i ijehliyen, aaaqeb aqeoean
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Mi d usan $uowen iasekoiwen, Nuzen asen d avu, akked iasekoiwen ur twalam. Oebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Mi wen d kkan sennig wen, seddawat wen, mi zzint wallen, ulawen bbwven s ijuxax, tepmeyyizem yal ameyyez $ef Oebbi
Dinna, ppwajeooben lmumnin, enhezzen s leqsee
Mi d nnan ixabiten, akked imehzulen n wul: "ay $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, siwa a$uoou
Mi d inna urbaa segsen: "a yAt Yatrib, ur illi umekkan i kunwi, u$alet"! Kra segsen ssutren tsrie i Nnbi, nnan: "ih, ixxamen nne$ aaran". Nitni, ur llin aaran, b$an kan ad rewlen
Ma kecmen ten id, si leriaf is, sinna, ssutren asen ad xubten, ad xubten. Cwii kan ara kukrun fellas
Ni$ llan auhden s Oebbi, uqbel, ar ur ppu$alen ar deffir. Aaahed s Oebbi ad ippuqeiii
